text: Belvedere is a small city in Marin County in the state of California, United States. It has no shops or restaurants. The population was 2,126 at the 2020 census. It is about northeast of Sausalito. ==References== Category:1890s establishments in California Category:1896 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Marin County, California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Belvedere, California
